title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 that focus on multi-modal dialogue grounding and its application in dialogue systems and conversational agents
**"Deep Reinforcement Learning for Dialogue Generation"** - Li, Jiwei, et al
**"End-to-End Learning of Semantic Role Labeling Using Recurrent Neural Networks"** - Zhou, Jie, et al
**"Visual Dialog"** - Das, Abhishek, et al
**"Multimodal Machine Translation with Embedding Prediction"** - Elliott, Desmond, et al

author.literal: **"Multimodal Conversational Search and Recommendation"** - Radlinski, Filip, and Nick Craswell.

title: **"Towards a Neural Conversational Model"** - Vinyals, Oriol, and Quoc Le
**"Learning to Ground Instructions with Reward Learning"**
**"Visual Dialog State Tracking for Question Generation"** - Kottur, Satwik, et al
**"Multimodal Dialogue Systems: Challenges and Opportunities"** - Baltru≈°aitis, Tadas, et al
**"Grounding Language in Play"**
**"Multimodal Transformer Networks for End-to-End Video-Grounded Dialogue Systems"** - Hori, Chiori, et al

author.literal: **"Visual and Dialog Navigation"** - Thomason, Jesse, et al.

title: **"Multimodal Fusion for Video-Grounded Dialogue Generation"** - Alamri, Huda, et al
**"Grounded Language Learning in a Simulated 3D World"**
**"Deep Reinforcement Learning for Visual Dialogue"** - Das, Abhishek, et al
**"End-to-End Multimodal Dialog Systems with Hierarchical Multimodal Attention"** - Lee, Kyungjae, et al
**"Multimodal Conversational Agents for Interactive Storytelling"** - Yu, Haonan, et al
**"Grounded Language Learning from Video Descriptions"**
**"Learning to Generate Grounded Visual Questions"** - Mostafazadeh, Nasrin, et al
**"Multimodal Context-aware Natural Language Generation for Conversational Agents"**

These articles cover a range of topics within the field of multi-modal dialogue grounding, including reinforcement learning, visual dialog, multimodal machine translation, and more. They should provide a comprehensive overview of the state-of-the-art research up to
